About VENETX

VENETX was established under the corporation of HYDRABURX CORPORATION in September 2014, looking to provide customers with high quality hosting and support. We continue to expand and grow bigger everyday which is the key of our success. At VENETX, we keep everything at a very affordable price while maintaining our hosting qualities and expectations high. All of our servers uses RAID system and a backup system to maintain your important data with high redundancy and premium networks for quick loading speeds. We keep a high uptime promise at 99.9%. If you aren't completely satisfied with our hosting we offer a 7 day money back guarantee regardless of reason*!

Dedicated Servers;
  • Locations: Los Angeles,USA
Features
  • Unmetered High Premium Bandwidth
  • VPS Control Panel
  • Instant Set-up
  • Instant Plan Upgrade/Downgrade
  • Multiple Linux Operating Systems
  • Connected to Tier 3 Networks
  • Connected to Premium 1Gbps Connectivity
